about_the_game:
Story

A group of friends find themselves stuck in an old house during a thunderstorm. They discover a strange fertility themed board game and decide to humor it. As the game goes on, they start experiencing nausea, fatigue, and other unusual symptoms. They laugh it off, until eventually one girl's stomach visibly swells.

Separated from the rest of the world, their only option is to continue playing and hope things revert back to normal when someone wins.

In summary, a Jumanji inspiration, with a dark twist and a focus on pregnancy and fertility.

Gameplay

Gameplay consists of navigating through the house, interacting with the other characters and solving occasional puzzles in order to progress the story.

Three branching paths are available.

Completing all three routes unlocks Free Play mode, which functions as a dynamic board game with character commentary.

Yuri is a sarcastic and cynical individual. She's cold and aloof, but deep down she cares about her friends. She's not afraid to speak her mind and is blunt when giving advice.

Kari is a flirtatious and mischievous girl. She's popular and well-liked, and her cheerful attitude is infectious. However, she has a tendency to get bored easily and seek out new thrills.

Nanami is shy and timid. She's used to being ignored or teased by her friends. She's careful and cautious, and doesn't jump into things without thinking.

content_descriptors.notes:
Partial nudity, strong language, dark and vulgar humour.
Depiction of pregnancy.

name: Coffee Extra: Ukuzala

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i3/Ryzen 2000, 2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i3/Ryzen 2000, 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A mysterious board game that magically turns its players pregnant. Navigate through a spooky house and solve puzzles in order to beat the game and help the heroines escape unscathed.
